name: timestamp-wizard
title: TimeStamp Wizard
description: Convert between timestamps and date formats instantly. Perfect for developers and everyone who works with dates and times.
author: levelio

commands.name: index
commands.title: TimeStamp Wizard
commands.description: Convert between timestamps and various date formats. Shows current time when empty.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
